item.title: About
item.description: I grew up in Boise, Idaho. After finishing college at The College of Idaho I moved to Durham, North Carolina for a research fellowship with the US EPA. In 2015 my wife and I decided to stay in Durham for the long-haul as I started at UNC in the MD/PhD program. I completed my PhD in Bioinformatics and Computational Biology under the mentorship of Kirk Wilhelmsen at the Renaissance Computing Institute.
